contextId.information: Paul is implicitly speaking of Christ's servants as if they were athletes. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]] and [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_metaphor]])
contextId.quote: as an athlete, he is not crowned unless he competes by the rules

contextId.information: "in the presence of God and Christ Jesus." It is implied that God and Jesus will be Paul's witnesses. AT: "with God and Christ Jesus as my witnesses" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
